website_summaries.verdict: Nice looking and numbered for an educational aspect, these pins are on the small side and better suited for indoor use.
pros: You get 10 pins and 2 balls with this set, all constructed of lightweight foam
Comes with a portable zippered case
cons: Due to seams on the bottom, some of these don't stand up well, particularly outside
Smaller than expected, with the pins being only 7 inches tall

customer_reviews.title: Soft foam means little noise.
customer_reviews.text: Parents love this set. This is soft foam and doesn't make a lot of noise falling down. Kids love playing with them and putting them in number order. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: leftbrain4all

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Has a little bit of a chemical smell but I’m sure that will fade eventually. I love the foam too so if my son decides to throw them I don’t have to worry about him breaking something or hurting someone.
customer_reviews.author: KatEd

customer_reviews.title: Love two balls, problems with bag and standing up the pins
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 3.5 stars ... somewhere between okay and like. I love that there are two balls; It was hard to find. I do not like the fact that the zipper on the bag ripped after about 5 min. The bag in general is poor quality and not roomy enough. The pins don't stand as easily as I would expect, even on wooden floors. I would not even try on carpeted floors.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling play set for my grandson2
customer_reviews.text: Great bowling play set for my grandson2.5 years old. Easy to play, great colors, educational game as well. Thank you. I recommend to buy it, since ToysR Us is not around anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Leonid Yakobson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: These are small enough for a two-year-old's tiny hands. They are colorful, lightweight, easy to store in the bag they came in, and useful for so much more than just bowling for a toddler (color sorting, counting, number recognition). Don't expect full-size bowling pins, but also don't pass these up if you have a two to five-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Jessmo

customer_reviews.title: Great that all parts fit into a case
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 1/2-year-old grandson loves this! He can identify the numbers, which helps with counting and sequencing. Great that all parts fit into a case!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl blonstein

customer_reviews.title: Rainy day fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kid who can't stand being inside for long periods of time. These were a hit! We break them out anytime it rains or when we just need to be inside for a little while. We bowl down the hallway or play catch or pretend we have weird swords. We definitely dont run out of things to do with these. Great purchase for my 2 year old who wants to go, go, go.
customer_reviews.author: Carina B

customer_reviews.title: I love these, they stand up great
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they stand up great! The only problem for us, is our 2 year old bit a chunk out of the pins. So if your child still chews on things, this is not the pin set you’d want.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Pefect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: The bowling ball is a bit small for adult hands but it fits perfectly for my child. I bought this bowling set for my son when he was 3 year old. Because I enjoy bowling and would love to get my son into it. He plays with it all the time. We play with it indoors use this toy to keep child busy. With the wooden floors in our home and so far we have had no issues with it messing up the floors.
customer_reviews.author: George Peh

customer_reviews.title: I love that it keeps him busy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old! He loves it! I love that it keeps him busy, but after he gets bored, he likes to throw the pins at me. So great nice soft products for toddlers to like to throw things at you!
customer_reviews.author: Blakeysworld

customer_reviews.title: looks cute, but not easy to make them standing as easy
customer_reviews.text: Strong plastic smell and stayed for a while... looks cute, but not easy to make them standing as easy... not recommended ...
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Check the size
customer_reviews.text: I obviously didn't look far enough into this. It's tiny. I'm seriously disappointed. I could have bought a large one for the same price. I liked the look of this better. I'm really upset that I didn't check the size.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This set was much smaller than I expected and would be very difficult for young kids to set up on their own. It was actually kind of a pain for bigger kids, too. (aged 55+)
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids around 5 years old, soft so really no likelihood of damage to people or property.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry CRNA

customer_reviews.title: The pins and ball are soft - makes setting up the pins on carpet a bit of a challenge - they perform better on a hard surface
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5-year old grandson and he adores it! The pins and ball are soft - makes setting up the pins on carpet a bit of a challenge - they perform better on a hard surface. If that had not been an issue, I would have given the toy 5 stars. The carrying case is a great “puzzle” to challenge him in how to pack it when he puts it away. Overall, he is thrilled so I am as well.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Sue

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable fun for the family.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved them he really enjoyed bowling so the gift was well worth it. The pins coulded of been a little heavier so when you stood them up they didn’t fall down so easy before you got to roll the bowling ball.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rainier

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 2 year old boy's birthday. He loved it! Comes with 2 balls, are soft rubberized soft filled pins and balls, can't hurt anyone if hit by one. The 2 year old can set up pins by himself, at knock them down, he's very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: barbara price

customer_reviews.title: I suppose it's fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it's fine for the price. Doesn't blow my socks off but we've decided to keep it for Christmas for our kids. It'll be great for the 2 and 4 year old, my 6 and 8 year olds will probably think it's kinda dumb. The balls are pretty small, as are the pins. It's all nerf... it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have had so much fun with this bowling set
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun with this bowling set. They are much shorter than I thought, but they are so easy for my 3-year-old granddaughter to set up on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: These could be bigger..more for babies.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 and 6 year old boys. They love bowling. They have yet to get into and it just looks like its ln a smaller scale like this is for babies. The pins are smaller then a soda bottle. And ots all a foam ish squishy material. It comes with 2 bowling balls also same squishy material. ALL in all id say its about right for the price i paid. i just wish they made it seem like it was more for babies then bigger kids.
customer_reviews.author: holley

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for kids of all ages at parties or for play at home
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for kids. I bought it for my daughters 4th birthday party. Kids from 2 to 5 years old loved it. They are light weight but stand up well. The balls and pins are soft enough they womt damage anything when thrown but still durable. Now it's a great game to have at home even after the party. Something fun for kids to do when stuck inside during the winter
customer_reviews.author: ashleymg

customer_reviews.title: Good for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: Compact indoor bowling set for young children. Not good for outdoors - light wind would knock these over. Best use for very small children - 4 and under. Too small for 5+ and got bored easily with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: I have a long hall leading to my family room so I got this for my grandkids to play with. They love it, the 3-year old asks to bowl every time he walks in the door. It is definitely a toy, not expected to resemble real bowling, but the little ones enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew absolutely loves this! He can set it up himself and knock them over. The only thing is that the seem on the pins makes it a tad difficult to sit them up. Not the end of the world, just something to mention. Over all great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The pins aren’t weighted at all, so they fall too easily, and they have a foam strip on the bottom that makes it hard for them to stand up to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Knx

customer_reviews.title: I think he will love it. This is exactly as pictured and came ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for his 2nd birthday. I think he will love it. This is exactly as pictured and came with all of the parts in tact. The only complaint I have is the bag the item came in. I was 1/2 way through zipping the bag and the zipped side came undone. I unzipped the entire thing and started over, then it zipped fine. Not sure if the bag is damaged but the actual items are fine.
customer_reviews.author: lnarthur

customer_reviews.title: Good safe fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this. The parents will appreciate that it will not scratch or ruin floor/walls etc. and is very quit. The kids will just have a blast bowling at home.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: NICE AND COLORFUL
customer_reviews.text: My two grand babies love this colorful set. They love to bowl. Its soft, so nothing gets broken. And it has a nifty carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyeboop

customer_reviews.title: Watch out
customer_reviews.text: Made of foam and easily broken not good for young children 2 years old.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present hopefully they like it. Send to be of his quality

customer_reviews.title: perfect for grandson
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson love to play this. They are soft and durable and colorful. He has so much fun bowling with this set. Recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My sons obsessed with bowling and this set was perfect for playing in the house.

customer_reviews.title: Better for older kids who dont bite toys

customer_reviews.text: i was very disappointed in the size of the bowling set its very small

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not too durable

customer_reviews.title: Three of a kind is great for poker, not bowling 😞
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is great. However, I was hoping to use as a teaching/counting tool for my one year old grand daughter, but missing the 5 and 6 pins. 1 2 3 3 3 4 7 8 9 10 ***thank you for sending the corrected pins***

customer_reviews.title: ... and quality of the balls and bottles are really good. A missing star for the weird plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: The color and quality of the balls and bottles are really good. A missing star for the weird plastic smell.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My baby toddler bite it and try to eat that why it's not good for my baby

customer_reviews.title: This is for a toddler not the age it is reported for.
customer_reviews.text: The pins are so short/small they are really for a toddler not the age it is supposed to be for. Also, the pins won't stand up.. Cheap made toy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Henley

customer_reviews.title: Teaches not all balls get thrown, teach that some ba are for rolling..
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids enjoys this. Great way to learn numbers and straight up bowling. It was in great shape, and the colors are bright. Only thing that is difficult is getting it back into the package. If it included a picture of how to rep the ck as after playing that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Lema

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but perfect for the boys.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 and 4 year old boy. These were smaller than expected, but they are perfect for the boys. They are a hard foam and comes with two bowling balls. They like them.

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: The colours are vibrant my nephew loves it He counts while playing. The material is soft and child friendly

customer_reviews.title: Pins fall over easily

customer_reviews.title: Love it

We played this a regular bowling game and also and aim and shoot type of style around the house, so the kids loved it. Overall, Great product.

product_meta.title: iPlay, iLearn Kids Bowling Toys, Party Favors, Foam Ball Play Set, Indoor Sport Game, 10 Pins, 2 Balls, Early Development Gifts for 1 2 3 4 Year Olds, Children, Toddlers, Boys, Girls (Blue)
product_meta.description:
CLICK 'Sold by iPlay, iLearn' ABOVE AND EXPLORE MORE WONDERFUL GOODS ~

---------iPlay, iLearn ----------

iPlay, iLearn CUSTOMER SERVICE

-iPlay, iLearn7x24-hour message reply (Mon-Sun).
-iPlay, iLearn30-day money back and 12-month quality guarantee.
-iPlay, iLearnHassle free replacement.

Quality warranty is only valid with your purchase from iPlay, iLearn.

AboutFounder:

iPlay, iLearnis a caring, family business created by an Early Childhood Teacher and Mother, who wanted to ensure that all Children have access to fun, safe toys that assist in their development of life skills, motor skills and thinking processes.

Kids Bowling Play Set, Safe Foam Ball Toy Gift, Learning, Educational, Early Development Sport Toys, 10 Pins and 2 Bowling Balls for Ages 2, 3, 4, 5 Year Olds and Up Children, Toddlers - iPlay, iLearn

---------- Product Description ----------

Features:

Our bowling play sets have the following characteristics:
SAFE BOWLING: High grade foam material
COMPLETE SET: 10 pins & 2 balls
EASY STORAGE: Delicate packaging
INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Each pin is 7" tall

The Bowling play sets help get kids moving, nurturing both gross and fine motor skills. Use the pins and balls to encourage early color recognition and counting skills. 
Young toddlers gain self-esteem as they learn to knock over the pins.

*****Our Toys are tested with EN71, ASTM F963 and CPSIA. All toys passed Federal Hazardous Substances Act Regulations.*****

iPlay, iLearn toys are competitively priced with a 100% guarantee.
* Packing dimension: 13’’ x 7.5’’ x 4.5’’
* WHAT YOU GET:
* Bowling Ball x 2
* Pin x 10
* Recommended age: 36 MONTHS UP


Click "Add to Cart" yellow button above and get it for your kids or for your family!
feature_bullets: This toy was tested by CPSC accepted third party laboratories. All passed.
This bowling set is made of high grade foam material. Safe for kids playing alone. Best birthday gift for 2 Years Old and Up.
10 bowling pins (7") and 2 bowling balls (3"). Lightweight bowling ball toy set comes with ten foam pins and two foam bowling balls. Very easy for little hands to play with.
Specific foam design is safe for children when playing. 12 total soft foam pieces, plus portable zippered carrying case. Great for toddlers and preschoolers.
Suitable to play indoors or outdoors. Helps children develop spacial awareness, hand-eye coordination, balance and gross motor skills.

If your child has asked about going bowling, but you're worried about slippery lanes and heavy balls, this is the perfect game for you. Your child can go bowling with a foam ball and pins, so all of the risk of a regular trip to the bowling alley is gone!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars396 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
